metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11880 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in KDE KMail before 19.12.3. By using the proprietary (non-RFC6068) "mailto?attach=..." parameter, a website (or other source of mailto links) can make KMail attach local files to a composed email message without showing a warning to the user, as demonstrated by an attach=.bash_history value.

criterions.comment: kdepim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
